本书是作者在教育领域相关论文、报纸文章、讲话稿以及个别访谈、书序的精选集，跨度长达二十多年（1988—2011）。全书分成五编：教育的价值、价值的教育、思想品德教育、哲学教育、教育管理。本书主题集中，思考深入，从一个侧面反映了当今中国教育的状况，表达了作者对教育问题的长期思考、体会和建议。

作者简介

Hart Zhen，got his Ph.D. degree in Beijing Normal University. He was the former Vice President of Beijing Normal University and President of Beijing Foreign Studies University. He is now a Ph.D. supervisor and the CPC Committee Secretary of Beijing Foreign Studies University. Professor Han's scholarship focuses on modem European and American philosophy, Western historical philosophy, and value philosophy. He has won several national and provincial & ministerial awards for achievements in humanity studies and social sciences.
